Package org.cesecore.audit.audit

Interface SecurityEventsAuditorSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SecurityEventsAuditorSessionLocal, SecurityEventsAuditorSessionRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SecurityEventsAuditorSessionBean
    public interface SecurityEventsAuditorSession
    Allows auditing of securely logged events.
    Version:
    $Id: SecurityEventsAuditorSession.java 17625 2013-09-20 07:12:06Z netmackan $
    See Also:
    Audit Security Events

    • Method Detail

      • selectAuditLogs

        List<? extends AuditLogEntry> selectAuditLogs​(AuthenticationToken token,
                                              int startIndex,
                                              int max,
                                              QueryCriteria criteria,
                                              String logDeviceId)
                                       throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Select a set of events to be audited.
        Parameters:
        token - identifier of the entity performing the task.
        startIndex - Index where select will start. Set to 0 to start from the beginning.
        max - maximum number of results to be returned. Set to 0 to use no limit.
        criteria - Criteria defining the subset of logs to be selected.
        logDeviceId - identifier of the AuditLogDevice
        Returns:
        The audit logs to the given criteria
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If non-admin user

      • exportAuditLogs

        AuditLogExportReport exportAuditLogs​(AuthenticationToken token,
                                     CryptoToken cryptoToken,
                                     Date timestamp,
                                     boolean deleteAfterExport,
                                     Map<String,​Object> signatureDetails,
                                     String logDeviceId)
                              throws AuditLogExporterException,
                                     AuthorizationDeniedException
        This operation is used to export a set logs.
        Parameters:
        token - identifier of the entity performing the task.
        cryptoToken - Crypto Token to be used.
        timestamp - Timestamp till which the logs will be exported.
        deleteAfterExport - Deletes the exported results if true.
        signatureDetails - Map containing signature details used by the signer implementation.
        logDeviceId - identifier of the AuditLogDevice
        Returns:
        A extended validation report with the path to the exported file.
        Throws:
        AuditLogExporterException - If export fails
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If non-admin user
        See Also:
        public static variables for examples.

      • exportAuditLogs

        AuditLogExportReport exportAuditLogs​(AuthenticationToken token,
                                     CryptoToken cryptoToken,
                                     Date timestamp,
                                     boolean deleteAfterExport,
                                     String keyAlias,
                                     String algorithm,
                                     String logDeviceId)
                              throws AuditLogExporterException,
                                     AuthorizationDeniedException
        This operation is used to export a set logs.
        Parameters:
        token - identifier of the entity performing the task.
        cryptoToken - Crypto Token to be used.
        timestamp - Timestamp till which the logs will be exported.
        deleteAfterExport - Deletes the exported results if true.
        keyAlias - alias identifying the key to be use in the file signature.
        algorithm - signature algorithm.
        logDeviceId - identifier of the AuditLogDevice
        Returns:
        A extended validation report with the path to the exported file.
        Throws:
        AuditLogExporterException - If export fails
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If non-admin user

      • exportAuditLogs

        AuditLogExportReport exportAuditLogs​(AuthenticationToken token,
                                     CryptoToken cryptoToken,
                                     Date timestamp,
                                     boolean deleteAfterExport,
                                     String keyAlias,
                                     String algorithm,
                                     Certificate certificate,
                                     String logDeviceId)
                              throws AuditLogExporterException,
                                     AuthorizationDeniedException
        This operation is used to export a set logs.
        Parameters:
        token - identifier of the entity performing the task.
        cryptoToken - Crypto Token to be used.
        timestamp - Timestamp till which the logs will be exported.
        deleteAfterExport - Deletes the exported results if true.
        keyAlias - alias identifying the key to be use in the file signature.
        algorithm - signature algorithm.
        certificate - certificate used in the signature.
        logDeviceId - identifier of the AuditLogDevice
        Returns:
        A extended validation report with the path to the exported file.
        Throws:
        AuditLogExporterException - If export fails
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If non-admin user

      • verifyLogsIntegrity

        AuditLogValidationReport verifyLogsIntegrity​(AuthenticationToken token,
                                             Date date,
                                             String logDeviceId)
                                      throws AuditLogValidatorException,
                                             AuthorizationDeniedException
        This operation is used to verify integrity of log to detect potential modifications.
        Parameters:
        token - identifier of the entity performing the task.
        date - Date from which to start verifying logs.
        logDeviceId - identifier of the AuditLogDevice
        Returns:
        validation report.
        Throws:
        AuditLogValidatorException - If export fails
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If non-admin user

      • getQuerySupportingLogDevices

        Set<String> getQuerySupportingLogDevices()
        Returns:
        a Set of ids for AuditLogDevice that supports querying.
